title: What is ASI artificial superintelligence? - Quora

response.answer_text: ASI is what the best AGI will automatically become after it’s been running for a few weeks, so the distinction between them is rather artificial. An AGI system which applies the rules of mathematics (including reasoning) to all things without error will be able to achieve what the best humans can do, but inordinately more quickly because the best humans make a lot of mistakes and take a long time to find and correct them. It’s the speed difference that will matter, and the ability to crunch astronomical amounts of data. The actual rules that it applies will be the same ones that mathematicians already know. Teams of the best human minds simply cannot think quickly enough to be able to complete in a lifetime the kinds of task that AGI/ASI will be able to handle in an hour. It’s all about speed of processing and lack of errors.

Superintelligence is the technology which demonstrates intelligence that surpasses even the smartest and most gifted minds of humans. It can also be referred to problem-solving systems like engineering assistants and superintelligent language, doesn’t matter if these enhanced intellectual competencies are embedded in agents acting in the real world.
